did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Papers Pertaining to the Silver King Mine, 1876-1885
did.abstract: Benjamin W. Reagan was a prospector and one of the discovers of the Silver King Mine, Pinal County, Ariz. This collection contains correspondence, assay reports, financial papers, legal papers, three photographs of family members and other materials relating to the settlement of the Reagan estate in the 1880s.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Mrs. Laurence M. Huey, 1963.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Prospector and one of the discovers of the Silver King Mine, Pinal County, Ariz.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 2 series, arranged chronologically within each.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, assay reports, financial papers, legal papers, three photographs of family members and other materials relating to the settlement of the Reagan estate in the 1880s.
